messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Check out my dynamic form!
Victory is assured!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Being a good swimmer doesn’t make
me any better as a Trainer...
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
Hi! You’re that kid who’s great with
Pokémon!I’ll battle with an even more dynamic
form than before! Watch me now!
